page.title: 07TRANSPORT
page.content:
To show the volume of traffic using Lytham Road we carried out a traffic survey. We did this every Monday, Wednesday and Friday for 3 weeks, between the hours of 10am - 11am and 3pm - 4pm. 2 children counted the traffic going to Lytham and the other 2 counted the traffic going to Preston. Here are samples of our results
Wednesday 22.5.85 Friday 24.5.85
Lytham Preston Lytham Preston
Cars 1150 775 600 1090 Buses 20 10 10 10 Coaches 30 10 10 20 Lorries 245 170 130 260 Bicycles 35 25 5 20 M'Cycles 30 20 10 25 Mopeds 60 50 40 50
